A Mimic would be great.  I would like to be able to buy Golems and 
Giant Skeletons.  This might seem ridiculious, but how about a set of 
character classes that can surive in water?  That seem limiting, but 
currently, only 2 current characters classes can go over water.

--- In gladiator@egroups.com, "Ricky Der" <TheLegendaryLight@w...> 
wrote:
>    Hmmm, A new class?  How Bout a Mimic? those are cool, pluse we 
should
> have other classes like bards or Enchanters hehehe
hmm.  We already have mages so we do not need enchanters.  How a 
character class that is a cross between a Cleric and a Mage?

I would love to see the Archer be able to shoot a poison arrow.  It 
would continiously take off 2-5 health points every second.  Also, a 
barrage of exploding arrows would be a nice addition to the arsenal
of 
an Archer.
